title: multi animal tracking; questions on use

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Thank you for opening this issue!

My enviroments
OS: MaxOS 11.4 Big sur
DeepLabCut Version: DeepLabCut2.2
Anaconda env used:anaconda3
using google Colaboratory 

After I made analyzed video, I also did ....
deeplabcut.create_video_with_all_detections
deeplabcut.convert_detections2tracklets

These two were successfully done without any errors.
Then I did
 deeplabcut.convert_raw_tracks_to_h5(config_path, picklefile)
because I need h5 or csv file to analyze.

But I got an error as below,
===============================================================================
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-62-e9e55437385a> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.convert_raw_tracks_to_h5(path_config_file, picklefile)

1 frames
/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcut/refine_training_dataset/tracklets.py in load_tracklets_from_pickle(self, filename, auto_fill)
    229     def load_tracklets_from_pickle(self, filename, auto_fill=True):
    230         self.filename = filename
--> 231         with open(filename, "rb") as file:
    232             tracklets = pickle.load(file)
    233         self._load_tracklets(tracklets, auto_fill)

TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not list
===============================================================================

Please teach me how I can get cvs file.
